item.title: Documentation for Puppet-Gluster
item.description: Ironically, one of the reasons that I started writing Puppet code, was so that I could spend more time designing and building, and less time writing documentation. I suppose I’m a victim of my success, because Puppet-Gluster has grown large enough to warrant its own documentation. So I gave in, and put together some documentation. It’s available as markdown, and, also as a pdf. As before, there is an examples/ directory which you might want to use as additional reference.
